channel.title: Flipping an existing object
channel.description:
In the barbarian outpost agility arena my rope jump object seems to be backwards where you have to run to the opposite side to jump it.
I've tried using object manager and turning it like any other added object but it doesn't seem to be working..

item.title: Flipping an existing object
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“portugalrox, post:1, topic:550720”]In the barbarian outpost agility arena my rope jump object seems to be backwards where you have to run to the opposite side to jump it.

I’ve tried using object manager and turning it like any other added object but it doesn’t seem to be working…[/quote]
You would need to overwrite the default walking queue to walk to to the correct location. The rope probably faces the right direction, but the “corner” that the object exists on is on the opposite side.

Read full topic
